attributes.title: Killed my dog
attributes.review: When I first opened the app I saw this gross looking orange guy. I showed it to my dog to see if he’d recognize him and as soon as my dog saw him he literally dropped dead.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This is the worst app you could possibly get lots of glitches and it drains my phone battery very very fast. DONT GET

attributes.title: BAD.
attributes.review: When I downloaded this the app started to lag, and I’m pretty sure leaked personal data. Don’t download this. Walk into the party 🤪 with my crazy 😆🥳 pink wig 🥰

attributes.title: Worst App Ever! 😡
attributes.review: I was severally disappointed in this app! It is terrible! I would rather watch paint dry than even LOOK at this app. It is useless and pointless, just like President Trump!

attributes.title: ✨god awful✨
attributes.review: people really want to vote for this cheeto head? he’s a sexist, homophobic, transphobic, and a rapist. he literally said in an interview that republicans are dumb, and y’all still support him. we are just doing you guys a favor by getting rid of this app so you don’t have to see the kind of idiotic things he’s putting in your head.

attributes.title: Makes my phone crash faster than the economy during a recession
So bad

attributes.title: Once downloaded it killed my phone 😤😤

attributes.title: Phone crash
